documents.document: @dangergirl101 Yeah I'll watch it. Basically a winner gets on the next season?
@dangergirl101 I enjoyed Redemption. But you don't cover it on the site?
@dangergirl101 I'd rather see canvases that were unhappy. Which can lead to future Redemption episodes.
@dangergirl101 I know it's ridiculous. Sometimes like Sausage won that but still lost the finale.
@dangergirl101 After last night's lack of organization I expect a disaster of a finale. Don't care who wins just want something organized.
@dangergirl101 It also sucks for the open canvases who technically donated their body for nothing. Yes a free tattoo but still.
@dangergirl101 Actually Matt's was shown right after he got eliminated because of a tattoo he did earlier in the day. We never saw Kelly's unless online.

RT @TommyHelmArt: Thank you so much, @iammarvinsilva for being an incredible friend and an amazing teammate! Thank… https://t.co/nXONdDg5j5
@mattobaugh @dangergirl101 I don't blame you. Work smart not hard is my mentality.
@dangergirl101 3 finalists to do a certain style. Then after she got eliminated nobody saw her master canvas (who was also pissed off on social media)
@dangergirl101 Depressed about the fan outrage. He eliminated Kelly because "they've seen her do this style before" even though fans voted for all
@dangergirl101 Last finale Dave Navarro disappeared off social media for a few days cuz he was depressed. I listened to him talk about it on Dark Matter
@dangergirl101 Yes, common sense always takes a vacation that day.
@dangergirl101 Finale judging is a whole other show that we expect to be a disaster as always.
@dangergirl101 Not denying that. They made It sound that they would get judged by 2nd tattoo and Black Cobra with their first. #inkmaster
@dangergirl101 this episode made no sense. Basically Black Cobra Tattoo got a day to relax for not getting picked #inkmaster
Sad to see @TommyHelmArt and Empire State Tattoo get eliminated but I'm still rooting for Old Town Ink. #inkmaster
WTF? So basically Black Cobra Tattoo got a day to relax??? #InkMaster
Why would Golden Skull Tattoo or even the Alien Mary people want to be picked? They could have easily won #InkMaster
That's not right. Giving them only 4 canvases and if not picked you are up for elimination. #InkMaster
Ha! Matt and Katie screwed themselves by recommending every artist and they ended up getting stuck with the worst canvas #InkMaster
Is that @WWETheBigShow or King Kong Bundy??? #RAW
@pamelammars That's why I think it's all Raven and not her mom.
@pamelammars Yeah but with Raven, if her mom is responsible for this then she'd be over protective and not let her on the show.
@pamelammars Wow I didn't realize there was a real thing.
@pamelammars But I was wrong about hypochondria. Its actually the fear of getting these illness. Not the fact that they think they have it.
@pamelammars I think something may have happened and she over exaggerated the disorders but to the point where she may believe it.
@pamelammars I've seen the list of things. Hypochondria is an illness where a person thinks they have every single illness they hear about.
@pamelammars I think Raven just has hypochondria. But Alex is just a bitch.
@pamelammars I actually like Raven over Alex.
@pamelammars He'll be gone soon though.
@pamelammars To be fair this house has a lot of horrible people. Only Cody and Kevin were genuinely good. Same with Mark.
@pamelammars She's pretty much a glorified furniture in the house. Anyone can easily beat her in final 2.
@pamelammars Too bad she'll be a final 2.
@pamelammars How about we do her chant? https://t.co/wTPN18lHMW
@pamelammars You don't want to eat smores cereal like Matt?
@pamelammars I guess we can do that too.
@pamelammars I guess we can march together wearing an orange and silver ribbon.
@pamelammars https://t.co/FEHkgCfYqE solid orange and silver are available. One matches Matt's shirt other his hair.
@pamelammars What color should we give it?

@ChristiaNation_ I actually am happy with who won. But I do think based on the black and grey tattoo you should have been the final 2.
@tatugirl Hot
I was just thinking twitter needs to double down. 280 characters!! @Twitter

Where did @Aaronistattoo get that pink suit? #InkMaster #InkMasterFinale #InkLive
@ChicksDigScores We can't hear them and the artists and canvases on stage can't hear what the judges are saying
@dangergirl101 Shane for some reason is treated like BBUS 1 winner. Never talked about. Jason said he was done with the show after Redemption incident
@dangergirl101 But I wonder which other Master is returning. Joey was at finale but not on stage so I doubt he will be.
@dangergirl101 I just wasn't a fan of Matt's suit on season 6 finale. It was wrinkled and too big. Although he did have the best master tattoo that night.
@dangergirl101 But if it weren't for the 6 hour tattoo they would have been eliminated just based off the black and grey tattoo.
@dangergirl101 Yeah but she's got more critics. Like Matt seems more about tattooing and letting Katie be the villain.
@dangergirl101 Old Town. I think maybe as a reality show I'm not wowed by Black Cobra. Nothing against them but they seem bland.
@dangergirl101 I'm wondering how these votes work. Is it per tweet or per hashtag? I noticed Matt would # black cobra over 10 times in multiple tweets
Oncr again these online voting ruined the finale #InkMaster #InkLive
Black Cobra would have been eliminated on that black and grey tattoo. That's why I hate the voting #InkMaster #InkLive
I actually like this but why expose the breasts on a guy for life? Have the arm cover the nipples #InkMaster #InkLive https://t.co/NBrf4uFqJI
Seriously, next finale get rid of the audience. They ruin the show #InkMaster #InkLive
They need to control these idiotic audience members. They just about over the host #InkMaster #InkLive
